snippet.title: Slaycation Paradise - Sunny Day Trailer 😎
snippet.description:
Slaycation Paradise is coming on August 18th!
Wishlist on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1643850/Slaycation_Paradise/
Launching on: 
Steam, Epic, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 & 5 & Xbox One & Series X|S 

It’s Summer Time, and boy have we got the perfect tonic for you! Slaycation Paradise offers the ultimate in multi-dimensional apocalyptic tours. Slay away your worries with Twin-Stick action mixed with Tower Defence as you visit the end-of-world scenarios of your dreams!

Follow us on Twitter - https://twitter.com/MergeGamesLtd
Join our Discord! - https://discord.gg/MergeGames
